content.p: Nottingham’s School of Economics is highly regarded as one of the best economics schools in the world. The School of Economics at the University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM) is closely linked with the Schools of Economics in the UK and China. Our goal is to promote a strong commitment to teaching and research of the highest quality. Aligned with the University’s Knowledge Exchange Strategy, the School of Economics at UNM promotes active research collaboration and partnership, both within and outside of the University. Our faculty continues to distinguish themselves in teaching and research achievements. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
